captions.text: - Is there an on button?
What do you mean flip the board around?
Never ridden a skateboard before

but that doesn't mean I can't
ride one that thinks, right?
- It's an electric skateboard?
I've never skateboarded ever.
- Absolutely going to wear the helmet.

- Might as well go straight
to the motorized stuff, right?
- So I just go?
How do I make it stop, push the back?
- Step on this thing to make it go.
Oh god, yeah there he goes.
I feel cool!
- Skateboarding for the leisure class.
- This is effortless.

Suck it pedestrians a
Warlock is coming through.
- Boooom.

I am living in Back to
the Future right now.
- This is the future.

It's not hover board it's
just auto skateboard.
- I feel like a kid.
I feel like a young man.
Oh (bleeped).
- Jumping off, bailing.
- Holy (bleeped).
Don't talk while you're driving guys.
- This isn't as cool as Tony Hawk.

- It's weird, you're kind of
like in a perpetual squat.
- Oh I'm way better at this!
I'm still not very graceful.
Woo! Kick flip!

It's easy to ride a cool
skateboard when you're cool.
- You really have to have your whole
body weight on top on the accelerator

which is kind of scary
but also invigorating.
That's what this is all about right?
Looking cool, taking risks,
and riding my Zboard.

- It kind of feels like a
Segway but with like nuts.
You know if a Segway grew testicles?
- Girl you know you want it but
I got places to be.

comments.text:
I wish i would have had this when i was skateboarding a few years ago for 
transportation. I figure this board is probably heavier which could ne a 
good thing OR a bad thing! I rode so much that finally i stepped down wrong 
and my ankle just snapped- end of skateboarding!😊﻿

comments.text:
I this is a cool concept but only if it was made by a notable skateboard/ 
longboard company. Like these guys just came up with a board that requires 
no peddling, but I doubt it actually can make a as great driving experience 
with a signature longboard or skateboard. Now if was made by a company like 
Santa Cruz, Strght, etc, I would think it's worth considering but until 
then no way. Anything beats that and it's worth the work and less money.﻿
